Content: After clicking to place a part, a lot of buttons pop up at the top of the window
The part that is marked with a white box around it is the selected part.
You can select parts by clicking them.
Here are the functions of the buttons from the left to the right:
Drive the Vehicle. The vehicle must consist of at least 5 parts.
Delete a part. It will be available in the inventory after deleting it.
Unselect the current selected part or exit the part Information window
Open a window with information for the current selected part.
Sell the current selected part, for 75% of its original value.(not shown in the image)
